cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

set(theseTestsName umocktypes_ut)

set(${theseTestsName}_test_files
umocktypes_ut.c
)

set(${theseTestsName}_c_files
umocktypes_mocked.c
../../src/umockalloc.c
)

set(${theseTestsName}_h_files
)

umockc_build_test_artifacts(${theseTestsName} ON)
